## SimpleTimer class

A simple timer that stores only the latest measurement.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SimpleTimer implements Timer 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(statistics, name)](./harp-mapview.simpletimer._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>SimpleTimer</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [name](./harp-mapview.simpletimer.name.md) |  | string |  |
|  [running](./harp-mapview.simpletimer.running.md) |  | boolean | <code>true</code> if timer has been started. |
|  [statistics](./harp-mapview.simpletimer.statistics.md) |  | [Statistics](./harp-mapview.statistics.md) |  |
|  [value](./harp-mapview.simpletimer.value.md) |  | number \| undefined | Gets the latest measurement. This function may return <code>undefined</code> if no measurement was done. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [now()](./harp-mapview.simpletimer.now.md) |  | Samples the timer. Requires that the timer has started. |
|  [reset()](./harp-mapview.simpletimer.reset.md) |  | Resets the value to be able to start again. |
|  [setValue(val)](./harp-mapview.simpletimer.setvalue.md) |  | Sets the measurement value for the amount of time that has elapsed from start() to stop(). Use this function to override the timer's duration. |
|  [start()](./harp-mapview.simpletimer.start.md) |  | Starts the timer. Returns the current time, based on <code>Performance.now()</code>. |
|  [stop()](./harp-mapview.simpletimer.stop.md) |  | Stops the timer. Requires that the timer has started. |
